resources.string: create table TabelNahwu( id integer primary key autoincrement, kaidah_nahwu text, teori text, gambar_tabel_nahwu text);
create table TabelShorof( id integer primary key autoincrement, kaidah_shorof text, teori text, gambar_tabel_shorof text);
create table TabelSoal( id_soal integer primary key autoincrement, soal text, A text, B text, C text, D text);
create table TabelJawaban( id_jawaban integer primary key autoincrement, jawaban text, id_soal integer);
create table TabelMufrodats( id integer primary key autoincrement, kosakata text, arti text, kategori text);
